main.bio: Esprit professionnel, polyvalence, ponctualité, rigueur. S'adapte à l'environnement du travail pour innover, Passionné depuis toujours par les nouvelles technologies, je suis en constante veille.

testimonials.text: En 2 mots, Rigueur et Efficacité, c'est ainsi que je décrit le parcours de Mlle EL HAMMOUMI au sein de notre établissement.

Fatima Ezzahrae is a true talent when it comes to everything code. Her passion and drive to not only deliver on the project, but to exceed is very rare. She approaches every situation with an entrepreneurial perspective, with focus on ROI. I worked alongside her as a project manager for over a year, and she was beyond helpful in so many ways. Her work serious and is very punctual about deadlines/tasks. She has the vision and the knowledge to tackle any problem and find an stable practical yet elegant solution.
